articles.author: Steve Kopack
articles.title: Trump backs off higher tariffs for E.U. pharma and chips - NBC News
articles.description: The United States has agreed to limit tariffs on pharmaceuticals, lumber and semiconductors imported from the European Union to 15%, according to an agreement released Thursday
articles.content:
The United States has agreed to limit tariffs on pharmaceuticals, lumber and semiconductors imported from the European Union to 15%, according to an agreement released Thursday.
